name: Brighthouse Financial, Inc.
description: Brighthouse Financial, Inc. is a leading provider of annuities and life insurance products in the United States. Established in 2017 as a spin-off from MetLife, Brighthouse aims to help people achieve financial security and stability through innovative solutions tailored to meet a variety of customer needs. The company offers a diverse portfolio of insurance and annuity products that cater to individuals and families seeking to manage their long-term financial planning. With a commitment to transparency and customer service, Brighthouse Financial focuses on providing products that are easy to understand and aligned with its customers' financial goals. The company's product offerings include fixed and variable annuities, universal life insurance, and term life insurance. Brighthouse is dedicated to empowering its policyholders and financial professionals with the tools and resources needed to make informed decisions about their financial futures. As a prominent player in the financial services industry, Brighthouse Financial continues to grow and adapt to the evolving market landscape, positioning itself as a trusted partner for achieving financial wellness.
